list.name: Changes
list.comment: 1. Added transaction and notification tables. 2. Added wallet api and function to backend and mti_app. 3. Added environment easy switching into environment.dart 4. Added web platform into mti_web but problem on displaying profile image or image related. 5. Added transaction history and receipt in settings_screen.dart 6. Added swap screen with transfer and history tabs. Successfully search and transfer cash wallet amount to another user. 7. Added receipt in transaction_history_screen.dart 8. For money number, have proper format using number_formatter.dart 9. Account will be validated or approved when cash wallet is above USDT100 10. Only isTrader=true, the swap button will display and permitted to transfer. 11. Admin side now can manage user and also appoint trader. 12. When click on Register button in home_screen.dart, it will automatically pass affiliate code to the web for new user registration. 13. Enhance user_log and smooth operation.

task.summary: 1. Improve uiux design in home, login, network, profile and settings screen. 2. Enhance security performance and stability of this app especially at main.dart. 3. Now the app check for the token session for auto login. 4. Token valid for 3 days.

Added swap screen with transfer and history tabs. Successfully search and transfer cash wallet amount to another user. 7. Added receipt in transaction_history_screen.dart 8. For money number, have proper format using number_formatter.dart 9. Account will be validated or approved when cash wallet is above USDT100 10. Only isTrader=true, the swap button will display and permitted to transfer. 11. Admin side now can manage user and also appoint trader. 12. When click on Register button in home_screen.dart, it will automatically pass affiliate code to the web for new user registration. 13. Enhance user_log and smooth operation.

MESSAGE.value: 1. Improve uiux design in home, login, network, profile and settings screen. 2. Enhance security performance and stability of this app especially at main.dart. 3. Now the app check for the token session for auto login. 4. Token valid for 3 days.
